name: Furious For Speed Bike Race
description:
Download furious for speed bike race for free and play to get ultimate control over racing fever.
Ready to go with us in a fast and furious race? Gather all of your racing passion to take control over a divine racing adventure where you are free to play with coolest bike of your desire.
Furious for speed is designed to offer you a racing experience of fast and furious race. Burn up the streets with the heat of motocross mayhem. Tune your bike for an amazing moto race on your android device in no cost. What you need most to win the challenge is your extreme racer skills and true passion of fast drive. You have the mastered use of acceleration, breaking and steering.so don't forget your helmet and start your moto for race where incredible speed and sensation are waiting for you. If you are crazy about moto racing games then give our game a must try to enjoy an incredible gameplay full of thrilling and exciting levels.
Customize Your Bike
We provide you a variety of cool bikes for more brilliant racing experience. Where each bike has excellent physics and controls.
Choose your Player
We also provide you a facility to choose player of your own desire.5 different players are available for you to select for the crazy ride.
Multiplayer Mode
Crazy games offer you to play this game in a multiplayer mode so that you can diverse your gaming experience with your friends online.
Features of Furious For Speed Bike Race
★ Realistic bike physics controls
★ Real and stunning 3D environment
★ Different challenging and astonishing modes for race
★ Easy and intuitive tilt controls and handling
★ Crazy experience like fast and furious and furious racing games
★ Enjoy turbo speed at exciting racing tracks
